GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article based on article_id

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all aarticles based on the inline query if present, 2 previous versions superceded

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments for a given article_id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: POSTS a comment for a given article_id returns comment inserted

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: DELETES the comment with id specified by comment_id responds with the comment deleted

comment deleted.body: body content of the comment text
